original_title: So You Wanna Be a Rock 'n' Roll Star
overview: A ground-breaking feature-length fly-on-the-wall chronicle of Southend Band The Kursaal Flyers, as they tried to break in to the big time, this film is a stark depiction of three days on the road in Scotland and the north-east.
title: So You Wanna Be a Rock 'n' Roll Star
